title: Give me $150 for my T-Cards - SOLD!
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: Give me $150 for my T-Cards - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
I haven't had much luck selling raws here, so I'll try the reverse style BIN (done before here).  I want $150 (standard paypal preferred) no more; no less.   I'll start with a three card lot.  If there are no takers, I'll add a card every day until someone buys the lot or I run out of cards to add.

T206 Rube Waddell (throwing) P150 - no creases, but back damage (note, card was soaked in tap water)
T206 Joe Lake (no ball in hand) OM - creasing, scuffing on back, wet sheet transfer in left border on front
T206 Frank Oberlin OM - creasing
T206 Jake Pfeister (Seated) - two horizontal creases
T206 Ollie Pickering - trimmed; corner crease; small light wrinkle top border center
T205 Beals Becker - pinholes; creasing
I've been sick and didn't get a chance to add a fourth card yesterday...
Thought some one would have jumped by now...

What the heck, Erick, I'll take them :)

email me at [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url], and we'll go from there.


Thanks, and have a good one, Scott
